content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing automation research (input: {automation-science-pack: 10}, status: NO_POWER).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(-10.5, 18.5) with warnings ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"] and connection points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0) (status: NOT_CONNECTED).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) (status: NO_FUEL, warning: "out of fuel") containing a fluid box with approximately 189.89 units of water at temperature 15, with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), a steam output at (-7.5, 24.5), and linked to fluid system [74646].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) (status: WORKING) delivering approximately 99.26 units of water, with a connection point at (-9.5, 23.5) and linked to fluid system [74646].
- Manual Fuel Feeding System represented by a wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 74646 at position(-5.5, 19.5) (status: WORKING).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 74645 at position(-2.5, 19.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 74658 at position(5.5, 21.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 74657 at position(1.5, 23.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 74653 at position(-7.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 74662 at position(0.5, 24.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 74661 at position(1.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 74664 at position(1.5, 27.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 74665 at position(4.5, 27.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 74666 at position(-0.5, 28.5) (status: EMPTY).
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5) (voltage: 0).

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Pipeline Connection & Fluid Transfer:
  - Ensure source and target connection points are unobstructed, within effective range, and share matching fluid system assignments.
• Entity Placement & Collision Avoidance:
  - Verify that target tiles are unoccupied before placing entities.
• Buildable Area Calculation:
  - Use precise positional data during placement to avoid type-related errors.
• Pipe Group Identification & Fluid System Mapping:
  - Confirm that pipe groups are correctly assigned to a valid fluid system and are within the required proximity.
• Steam Engine Repositioning Attempts:
  - Repeated attempts to reposition the steam engine using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system identifiers [73318, 73402, 73484, 73568, 73650, 73734, 73816, 73900, 73982, 74066, 74148, 74232, 74314, 74398, 74480, 74564] have failed. Adjust fluid system configuration, search radius, and spatial alignment to ensure candidate pipe groups are available.
• Boiler Fuel Supply Management:
  - Monitor and replenish boiler fuel levels promptly to avoid operational shutdown.
• General Connection Strategies:
  - Assess environmental constraints and verify inventory levels before undertaking entity repositioning or pipeline attachments.
